account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the conference.

date_created.description: The date and time when the conference was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the conference was last updated.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API used for the conference.

friendly_name.description: A user-defined friendly name for the conference.

region.description: The region where the conference is hosted.

sid.description: The unique identifier (SID) of the conference.

status.description: The current status of the conference.

uri.description: The URI to access the conference resource.

reason_conference_ended.description: The reason for the conference ending, if available.

call_sid_ending_conference.description: The SID of the call that ended the conference, if applicable.

subresource_uris.description: Contains URLs for accessing subresources related to conferences

participants.description: URI to access the participants associated with the conference.

recordings.description: URI to access the recordings of the conference.
